name: For Pete's Sake
description:
/// Note that this is still WIP so there is placeholder art and no sound :(. Hope you enjoy it nonetheless.

In For Pete's Sake, you play as a developer participating in a 150 second game jam. The high intensity means that Pete must keep well fed and clean, or he will DIE. Pete's development cycle involves shooting bugs, glitches, and using combo-brackets.

I have done a few game jams now, so I thought I would go for something a bit more ambitious, however it turned out I didn't have enough time to finish all the art, or even start on music / sounds (damned school!), so I definitely want to focus on that next time round (LD43 looking at you). I think that this is the most enjoyable game I have made for a game jam, and I have really enjoyed the week!
